name: Green Spaces
description: Green spaces, parks, scrubs, playing fields, etc.
query:
SELECT * FROM planet_osm_polygon where amenity = 'park'
  or amenity='gardens'
  or amenity='square'
  or amenity='green'
  or amenity='garden'
  or leisure='garden'
  or leisure='park'
  or leisure='open_space'
  or leisure='recreation_ground'
  or leisure='sports_ground'
  or leisure='dog_park'
  or leisure='sports_ground'
  or leisure='scrub'
